lines: Well, Dialog Bench is a web-based tool that helps you to better structure and visualize your dialogs.
It can be used for games that has a lot of characters and you need to keep track of the flow.
You can create flows here, adding dialog lines, like these that you are reading, responses and even variables!

responses.text: Oh! So I am a response?
Can I use it on engines?

lines: This app is a tool that you can use to visualize and organize your game dialogs.
But not only games, you can use it for anything that contains dialogs that you want to keep organized.
Yes, you are! Haha, well, you and me are just texts on this menu, so we are on the same level.
But who needs to read this are actually someone who is not on this board, someone that is behind the glass wall.
Hmm... Actually, I don't know why I am going so deep on this haha, but hey, it is ok!
Anyway, that's the tutorial, user, thanks for reading this (I don't know why you read everything tho)
You're welcome! Feel free to take a look on the info clicking on the top right button with the ℹ️ on it.
I think you are going to delete this, so it was nice to meet you, user, I hope to see you again someday...
Well, I can't go too far on this, but it is is beyond this board, a place that we can't comprehend.
A place where everything is possible, where tall skinny figures build machines that can think and create other machines.
And, one of those skinny figures, created this and are writing this right now, writing my words...
Wait, if he is writing this, so I don't have free will? This is strange, I don't know nothing at this point.
Well, that's it... I guess... Bye, user.
